thread.title: Kentucky Unveils Plan to Implement Broadband Statewide
thread.title_full: Kentucky Unveils Plan to Implement Broadband Statewide

title: Kentucky Unveils Plan to Implement Broadband Statewide
text:
03 Kentucky Unveils Plan to Implement Broadband Statewide 
Government Technology: On Monday, Aug. 31, Kentucky leaders kicked off their plans to roll out broadband Internet service throughout the state as part of a three-year public-private partnership.Implementing the KentuckyWired I-Way broadband project is slated to cost the state and its private-sector partners an estimated $324 million in coming years, but officials are willing to pay the price to bring the state up to connectivity snuff and increase its competitive edge.
